title: My iPad's screen was scratched by an Apple pencil, the pen damaged the screen. I can only see it when I look carefully, but its presence bothers me. Does Apple provide any support on this issue? - Quora
tags: Advice About Apple Products and Services

response.answer_text: I would like to know exactly how the soft tip of the plastic pencil scratched the glass screen of your iPhone. Unless you dipped the tip in salt or other type of crystal that would be harder than a level 6 of the mohs hardness scale it wont scratch from the tip or the body of the Apple pencil. Apple would not cover this.
